# C01012 (COLOR) - Comprehensive Project Information

## Project Overview
C01012 (COLOR) is a web application designed to search for words that can be represented as valid hexadecimal (HEX) color codes. The project was inspired by a post on X (formerly Twitter) by @aarexer and builds upon an older project called car-p18s.

## Core Concept
The application uses a custom mapping system that converts letters to hexadecimal digits, allowing users to find words that can be used as valid CSS color codes. This creates a unique intersection between language and web design.

## Technical Architecture

### Frontend Framework

### Key Dependencies
- **@nuxtjs/tailwindcss**: Tailwind CSS integration
- **@nuxt/icon**: Icon management
- **@nuxt/fonts**: Font optimization
- **@vueuse/core**: Vue composition utilities
- **Fuse.js**: Fuzzy search library
- **@nuxtjs/sitemap**: SEO sitemap generation
- **@nuxtjs/robots**: SEO robots.txt management

## HEX Color Code Mapping System

### Valid HEX Syntax
- `#RGB` - Three-value syntax
- `#RGBA` - Four-value syntax
- `#RRGGBB` - Six-value syntax
- `#RRGGBBAA` - Eight-value syntax

### Custom Letter-to-Hex Mapping
The application uses a custom mapping inspired by LEET speak and SMS transliteration:

| Symbols | Latin         | Cyrillic |
| ------- | ------------- | -------- |
| `0`     | `o`, `O`      | `о`, `О` |
| `1`     | `l`, `L`, `I` |          |
| `2`     | `z`, `Z`      |          |
| `3`     |               | `з`, `З` |
| `4`     | `h`           | `ч`, `Ч` |
| `5`     | `s`, `S`      |          |
| `6`     | `G`           | `б`, `Б` |
| `7`     | `t`, `T`      |          |
| `8`     | `X`           |          |
| `9`     | `g`, `q`      | `д`, `Д` |
| `a`     | `a`           | `а`      |
| `b`     | `b`           |          |
| `c`     | `c`           | `с`      |
| `d`     | `d`           |          |
| `e`     | `e`           | `е`      |
| `f`     | `f`           |          |
| `A`     | `A`           | `А`      |
| `B`     | `B`           | `в`, `В` |
| `C`     | `C`           | `С`      |
| `D`     | `D`           |          |
| `E`     | `E`           | `Е`      |
| `F`     | `F`           |          |
| `10`    |               | `ю`, `Ю` |
| `11`    | `N`           |          |
| `12`    | `R`           |          |

## Word Sources
- **English words**: 479k words from english-words repository
- **Russian words**: 1.5m words from russian-words repository
- **Russian swear words**: 2.8k words from 2yxa
- **Funny words**: Custom collection from Ahaha-hehehe project

## Key Features

### Search Functionality
- Real-time fuzzy search using Fuse.js
- Support for multiple languages (English, Russian)
- Instant results with color preview
- Responsive design for all devices

### User Interface
- Clean, minimalist design
- Dark theme with accent colors
- Semantic HTML structure
- Accessibility features (ARIA labels, screen reader support)

### SEO Optimization
- Comprehensive meta tags
- Open Graph and Twitter Card support
- Structured data (JSON-LD)
- Sitemap generation
- Robots.txt configuration

## Example Transformations

### English Words
- "ass" → #a55 (reddish brown)
- "Bathesda" → #Ba74e5da (purple with transparency)

### Russian Words
- "бабоба" → #6a606a (gray)
- "ебасос" → #ebac0c (orange)

## Development Setup

### Prerequisites
- Node.js (v20+ recommended)
- Yarn package manager
- Git

### Installation
```bash
# Clone repository
git clone https://github.com/ebolblga/C01012.git
cd C01012

# Install dependencies
yarn

# Start development server
yarn dev
```

### Build Commands
```bash
# Development
yarn dev

# Production build
yarn build

# Preview production build
yarn preview
```

## Deployment
The application is deployed on Vercel at https://c01012.vercel.app

## Technical Notes
- All HEX color codes generated are valid CSS color values
- The application supports 3-digit, 4-digit, 6-digit and 8-digit HEX codes
- Search is case-insensitive and supports fuzzy matching
- The application is fully responsive and accessible
